data.actual_result: It doesn't allow you to type an underscore. When editing a channel that already as an underscore it is removed
data.expected_result: The underscore is typed and a text channel can contain an underscore
data.short_description: Cannot type underscores in text channel names
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new text channel, or edit an existing text channel - Attempt to give it a name with an underscore (_) Such as main_chat
